dcterms:creator: C. O. H¨ausler
M. Hanke
dcterms:description: The StudyForrest dataset contains 20 subjects with 7T MRA-ToF full brain volumetric images recorded with a Siemens MR scanner at 7-Tesla using a 3D Multiple Overlapping Thin Slab Acquisition Time of Flight angiography sequence. It was used for vessel segmentation, and multiple plausible segmentations were generated using the Frangi filter.
dcterms:title: StudyForrest

dcterms:creator: O. Commowick
M. Kain
R. Casey
R. Ameli
J.-C. Ferré
A. Kerbrat
T. Tourdias
F. Cervenansky
S. Camarasu-Pop
T. Glatard
dcterms:description: The Multiple Sclerosis (MS) Segmentation Dataset contains MRI scans of 53 patients with corresponding manual segmentations of lesions by seven experts. It was used for the MICCAI 2016 challenge and is characterized by variability in lesion location, size, and shape.
dcterms:title: Multiple Sclerosis (MS) Segmentation Dataset
